purpose.description: The full processing purpose name (e.g., 'Artificial Intelligence Compliance Management', 'Customer Service and Support')

purpose_category.description: The broad category of the processing purpose

risk_level.description: Risk level associated with this processing purpose

compliance_relevance.description: List of compliance frameworks relevant to this processing purpose

matched_pattern.description: The specific pattern that was matched to identify this purpose

confidence.description: Confidence score for this purpose identification (0.0 to 1.0)

evidence.description: Evidence snippets that indicate this processing purpose

metadata.description: Additional metadata about where and how this purpose was identified

total_findings.description: Total number of processing purpose findings

high_confidence_count.description: Number of findings with confidence above the threshold

purposes_identified.description: Number of unique processing purposes identified

ruleset_used.description: Name of the ruleset used for analysis

llm_validation_enabled.description: Whether LLM validation was enabled for this analysis

confidence_threshold.description: Confidence threshold used for filtering results

evidence_context_size.description: Size of context used for evidence extraction
